member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.UsbSerial
member.summary: A USB Serial module providing both serial communications and sleep detection/wakeup capabilities through a USB cable to a host device.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.UsbSerial.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The mainboard socket that has the module plugged into it.
member.remarks:
The function can be called to configure the before it is used. If it is not called before first use, then the following defaults will be used and cannot be changed afterwards:
Baud Rate - 115200
Parity - SerialParity.None
Stop Bits - SerialStopBits.One
Data Bits - 8

member.summary: Configures this serial line. This should be called at most once.
member.param: A value from the enumeration that specifies the parity.
